data.name: DalSessionException_UnknownId1
data.value: The ID type is '{0}' while expecting '{1}'
data.comment: Le type de l'ID est '{0}' alors qu'il devrait être '{1}'

data.name: Error_BeginBiggerThanEnd
data.value: The start time should be smaller than the end time
data.comment: The start time should be smaller than the end time

data.name: Error_NotSupportedDate_Hour
data.value: The value of hours has to be between 0 and 23
data.comment: The value of hours has to be between 0 and 23

data.name: Error_NotSupportedDate_Minutes
data.value: The value of minutes has to be between 0 and 59
data.comment: The value of minutes has to be between 0 and 59

data.name: Error_TooManyLoops
data.value: The program seems to be in an infinite loop
data.comment: The program seems to be in an infinite loop

data.name: Error_WrongTextForDate
data.value: Impossible to convert "{0}" into time
data.comment: Impossible to convert "{0}" into time

data.name: Ex_AuthorisationException
data.value: You are not granted to execute this action
data.comment: You are not granted to execute this action

data.name: Ex_BusinessLogicException
data.value: Impossible to execute this action. This is a unexpected state that wasn't forseen or it will break business logic rules.
data.comment: Impossible to execute this action. This is a unexpected state that wasn't forseen or it will break business logic rules.

data.name: Ex_ClosedSessionException
data.value: The session you're using to query the database is closed.
data.comment: The session you're using to query the database is closed.

data.name: Ex_ComponentException
data.value: An error occured in the DAL components. See inner exception for details.
data.comment: An error occured in the DAL components. See inner exception for details.

data.name: Ex_ConfigurationException
data.value: You already configured the DAL
data.comment: You already configured the DAL

data.name: Ex_DalConfigurationException
data.value: An error occured during the configuration of the database

data.name: Ex_DalSessionException_UnknownId
data.value: The ID type is '{0}' while expecting '{1}'
data.comment: Le type de l'ID attendu est '{0}' alors qu'il est '{1}'

data.name: Ex_EmptyPasswordException
data.value: Empty password are not accepted
data.comment: Empty password are not accepted

data.name: Ex_EncryptionException
data.value: An error occured while decrypting the specified text
data.comment: An error occured while decrypting the specified text

data.name: Ex_EntityAlreadyExistsException
data.value: This entity already exist in the database
data.comment: This entity already exist in the database

data.name: Ex_EntityNotFoundException
data.value: The searched item of type '{0}' doesn't exist in the database
data.comment: The searched item of type '{0}' doesn't exist in the database

data.name: Ex_EntityNotFoundException_NoPatient
data.value: No patient with id '{0}' was found.
data.comment: No patient with id '{0}' was found.

data.name: Ex_EntityNotFoundException_NoRelationRightSide
data.value: The patient of right side of the relation doesn't exist in the database
data.comment: The patient of right side of the relation doesn't exist in the database

data.name: Ex_ExistingItemException
data.value: The item you want to create already exist in the database.
data.comment: The item you want to create already exist in the database.

data.name: Ex_GoogleCalendarException
data.value: An error occured when communicating with Google Calendar
data.comment: An error occured when communicating with Google Calendar

data.name: Ex_GoogleCalendarExceptionFormat
data.value: Google Calendar reports this error: {0}
data.comment: Google Calendar reports this error: {0}

data.name: Ex_HasThumbnail
data.value: The picture already has a thumbnail
data.comment: The picture already has a thumbnail

data.name: Ex_NotLoadedEntityException
data.value: The entity you are using is detached from the database.
data.comment: The entity you are using is detached from the database.

data.name: Ex_NullItemInListException
data.value: A list of the object to save has at least one null element
data.comment: A list of the object to save has at least one null element

data.name: Ex_NullSessionFactoryException
data.value: The nHibernate session factory is not configured.
data.comment: The nHibernate session factory is not configured.

data.name: Ex_QueryException
data.value: An error occured during the execution of a query.
data.comment: An error occured during the execution of a query.

data.name: Ex_QueryException_SeveralDefaultUsers
data.value: More than one default user was found.
data.comment: More than one default user was found.

data.name: Ex_ReferencialIntegrityException
data.value: This action wasn't executed to keep the integrity of the data.
data.comment: This action wasn't executed to keep the integrity of the data.

data.name: Ex_SessionException
data.value: An error occured in the session
data.comment: An error occured in the session

data.name: Ex_SessionNotOpenedException
data.value: The session is not open. Please open it before query the database.
data.comment: The session is not open. Please open it before query the database.

data.name: Ex_ValidationException
data.value: An error occured during the validation of the DTO object.
data.comment: An error occured during the validation of the DTO object.
